meanings.definition: The fermentation of sugars by enzymes.
meanings.sent1: During zymolyses, enzymes help sugars ferment.
meanings.sent2: Zymolyses is an important process in making bread rise.
meanings.sent3: The zymolyses of the sugar mixture created a delightful aroma in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The zymolyses of ideas in his mind led to a creative breakthrough.
meanings.sent5: The zymolyses of the yeast in the dough made it fluffy and delicious.

meanings.definition: The breakdown of complex organic substances by enzymes.
meanings.sent1: Enzymes play a key role in the zymolyses of organic compounds.
meanings.sent2: Zymolyses is essential for the decomposition of organic matter in nature.
meanings.sent3: The zymolyses of the fallen leaves turned them into rich soil for the plants.
meanings.sent4: The zymolyses of old memories slowly faded away over time.
meanings.sent5: The zymolyses of the enzyme on the protein structure revealed its components.
